name: Ekya Schools
overview:
Ekya Schools, in association with the National Public Schools, are the newest members of the CMR Group of Institutions. Currently, we have two K-12 campuses, one at JP Nagar, and the other at ITPL.

‘Ekya’ means oneness, and at school we constantly encourage unity in diversity through a culture of community and collaboration. The Ekya learning experience focuses on developing a sense of curiosity and inquisitiveness in a child through active learning.

Our curriculum, instruction, and assessment techniques are student-centric, current and evidence-based. The Ekya Learning Centre constantly updates teaching and learning strategies to create optimal learning environments for our students. Ekya educators also undergo professional development modules periodically, which are designed in-house, as we believe that they are instrumental in shaping a student’s development, in every way.
